channel.title: Help ME I need help with Java and Javac error!
channel.description:
plz help if i try to run moparscape i get this:
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
and if i try to compile i get this:
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
someone help im newbie!! plz :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:

item.title: Help ME I need help with Java and Javac error!
item.dc:creator: @sk8ter sk8ter
item.description:
@sk8ter wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd”]For a ‘javac’ Error!
From MissSilabSoft:

  1. downloaded newest java
    http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/download.jsp (get the one without netbeans but with jdk 1.5)
  2. set CLASSPATH
  3. right click my computer and click properties
  4. click advanced
    3.click Enviorment Variables
  5. click NEW
  6. variable name “CLASSPATH”
  7. variable value “SET CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%;.”
    ^ do not add the quotes (these things “”)
  8. look at the file thats causing the error by right clicking and clicking edit if it has a directory too javac take it out and just have javac *java[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Help ME I need help with Java and Javac error!
